articles.title: Bus monitor from Mass. facing child molestation charges in RI
articles.description:
Kevin P. Langlois, 58, of Rehoboth, is accused of molesting two girls between the ages of 5 and 12 while he worked as a bus monitor in Barrington, R.I.

The post Bus monitor from Mass. facing child molestation charges in RI appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kevin P. Langlois, 58, faces child molestation charges in Rhode Island.
Accused of molesting two girls aged 5 to 12 while working as a bus monitor.
Incident raises concerns about child safety for Boston area families using school transport.
